title: Coronavirus: Wuhan to ease lockdown as world battles pandemic
description: The lockdown in the Chinese city where the outbreak began will be partially lifted next month.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Wuhan has been sealed off since mid-January
The lockdown in Wuhan, the Chinese city where the global coronavirus outbreak began, will be partially lifted on 8 April, officials say.
